title: My Pixel 4 is stuck at 2%
content:
Hi guys, my pixel 4 is constantly saying that the batter is at 2%, and the phone attempts to engage battery saver mode. This happens during and after charging. It also means that the phone does not shut down when the batter is drained, but shuts straight off.

Anyone have a similar issue and a fix at all? Tried power cycling, charging with the power off and resetting the phone. No dice...
